metadata.title: CVE-2020-8225 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A cleartext storage of sensitive information in Nextcloud Desktop Client 2.6.4 gave away information about used proxies and their authentication credentials.

criterions.comment: nextcloud-desktop package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.1-3').
